page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: Housing is concentrated in the two industrial villages of{Milnrow}and {Newhey}although there are hamlets at {Ogden}and several isolated farmhouses. There are many different styles and ages of houses. There have been several major periods of building. One important phase took place at the end of the{last century}when mainly stone or brick and slate terraces were built to house mill workers. These houses lacked certain facilities but most have now been improved but still lack garages or front gardens. In the{1930s}several council estates were built. These houses are semi detached with gardens to front and rear. Some have recently been bought from the Council by the tenants. In the{last 15 years}several private housing estates have been built.
